Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to show communication over a distance.
The student can illustrate the use of sound to send messages through the string telephone.
The student can include arrows or symbols in the drawing to demonstrate the flow of sound or information.
The student can depict how the design (e.g., cups and string) helps solve the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can illustrate the required features, such as the string being stretched tight for communication.
The student can use labels or brief explanations to describe how the string telephone works.
The student can show how using the string telephone is similar to other technologies used for communication.
